a.n: Centers of the Universe: Shaq & Yao

p.k: Every time they met on the court, it was a colossal event, Shaquille O'Neal and Yao Ming, two giants battling for supremacy in the league. Now, the two Centers of the Universe meet again. This time to reflect on their relationship as rivals and friends. Yao Ming shares the story of how he journeyed to the US and unlocked his talent in order to contend with the NBA's most dominant center, while Shaquille O'Neal reveals how their on-court confrontations led to a heightened level of respect for his competition.
